amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) by $99 million in fiscal year 2018.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 170 printed in House Report 115-297 to reduce the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) budget by $99,000,000, funding the NLRB at $150,000,000 for FY2018. The amendment also reduces budget authority by $99 million and outlays by $92 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A145) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 241 (Roll no. 510).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A145) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 241 (Roll no. 510).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A145) offered by Mr. Grothman.
